Capture Screenshots Quickly
QuickSnap empowers professionals like developers, designers, and digital marketers to capture screenshots effortlessly, helping you stay productive in your tasks.

Instant Sharing
With QuickSnap, sharing your captured screenshots is a breeze. Share them with colleagues, clients, or on your social media platforms with just a few clicks.

Effortlessly Manage Your Screenshots
QuickSnap goes beyond capturing and sharing screenshots. Experience the convenience of managing your visual content with the QuickSnap Web App.

ðŸ”’ Your Privacy Matters
At QuickSnap, we're committed to protecting your privacy and providing a seamless screenshot experience. We want you to feel confident using our extension. Here's how we handle your data:

1. Information We Collect
We collect minimal user data to enhance your experience and provide our services:

User Account Data: When you create an account, we collect your name and email for account management purposes. This data is not shared or used for any other purpose.
Screenshot Data: The screenshots you capture are stored locally on your device and are not transmitted to our servers.

2. How We Use Your Information
User Account: Your registration data is used to create and manage your account for accessing the QuickSnap Web App.
Screenshot Management: The screenshots you capture are stored locally on your device for your convenience.

3. Data Security
We prioritize the security of your data. User account information is securely stored, and your captured screenshots remain on your device. We do not share your data with third parties.

4. Third-Party Services
We use external image hosting platforms like Imgur for sharing your screenshots. Please review Imgur's privacy policy for more details.

5. Your Choices
You can create a user account to access enhanced features. If you choose not to create an account, you can still use QuickSnap for capturing and managing screenshots locally.

6. Updates to Privacy Policy
We may update our privacy policy as our features evolve. Any changes will be posted on this page.

7. Contact Us
If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at pise.akash09@gmail.com
